General.Name: TNR Gold Corp
General.Description: TNR Gold Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in the United States and Canada. It primarily explores for gold and copper deposits. The company holds a 90% interest in the Shotgun gold project that consists of 108 claims covering an area of 6,993 hectares located in southwestern Alaska. It also holds a 0.36% net smelter returns royalty on the Los Azules copper project located in San Juan province, Argentina. TNR Gold Corp. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1111 Melville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3V6
